Institutional preparedness for NEP
1. Multidisciplinary/interdisciplinary: One of the main focus of NEP 2020 is to make
education more multidisciplinary. In this light,
HBTU Kanpur has implemented NEP 2020 from the
academic session 2022-23 at the undergraduate level.
The features of the NEP 2020 agreed upon and
approved in several rounds of meetings in the
